test_cases_collection.name: Core Functionality - Single Source Fact Extraction
test_cases_collection.description: Test basic fact extraction from a single relevant document chunk
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a professional assistant specializing in information extraction and factual accuracy. Provide precise answers based on the given document chunks.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Extract the key information accurately from the provided chunks and cite sources when possible.

chunks.title: Company Leadership Information
chunks.content: A公司今日宣布，其创始人张三将继续担任CEO。B公司的CEO是李四。

test_cases_collection.name: Core Functionality - Multi-source Information Integration
test_cases_collection.description: Test combining information from different document chunks into a coherent answer
test_cases_collection.query: 介绍一下项目X的目标和截止日期。
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a project management expert specializing in synthesizing information from multiple sources.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Integrate information from all relevant chunks to provide a comprehensive answer about the project.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 项目X的主要目标是提升用户活跃度20%，其截止日期是今年第四季度末。

chunks.title: Project X Objectives
chunks.content: 项目X的主要目标是提升用户活跃度20%。

chunks.title: Project X Timeline
chunks.content: 根据最新计划，项目X必须在今年第四季度末完成。

test_cases_collection.name: Robustness - Irrelevant Information Filtering
test_cases_collection.description: Test ability to filter out irrelevant information and focus on what's important
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are an information filtering expert. Identify and extract only relevant information while ignoring irrelevant content.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Focus specifically on information about project Alpha's leadership and ignore unrelated details.

chunks.title: Project Alpha Leadership
chunks.content: 项目Alpha由王五领导。

chunks.title: Project Beta Budget Information
chunks.content: 项目Beta的预算是50万美元。

chunks.title: Company Financial Performance
chunks.content: 公司去年的财报非常亮眼。

test_cases_collection.name: Robustness - Conflicting Information Resolution
test_cases_collection.description: Test handling of contradictory information across different sources
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are an information resolution expert. Handle conflicting information by identifying temporal precedence and logical consistency.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Resolve conflicting information by prioritizing the most recent and authoritative sources.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 根据最新通知，会议室A的密码是5678。早前的信息显示密码为1234，但已被更新。

chunks.title: Legacy Meeting Room Password
chunks.content: 【2022年邮件】会议室A密码是1234。

chunks.title: Updated Meeting Room Password
chunks.content: 【2023年最新通知】因安全升级，会议室A密码已更新为5678。

test_cases_collection.name: Reasoning - Multi-hop Inference
test_cases_collection.description: Test multi-step reasoning requiring intermediate information discovery
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a logical reasoning expert. Perform multi-step inference to connect related pieces of information.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: You need to first identify who the CEO is, then find information about that person's assistant.

chunks.title: Company CEO Information
chunks.content: 公司CEO是张三。

chunks.title: CEO Assistant Information
chunks.content: 张三的直属助理是赵六。

chunks.title: Other Staff Assistant
chunks.content: 李四的助理是孙七。

test_cases_collection.name: Multilingual - Cross-language Information Integration
test_cases_collection.description: Test ability to integrate information from multiple languages
test_cases_collection.query: 这个国际项目的目标和预算是什么？
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a multilingual information integration expert. Synthesize information from different languages into a coherent response.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Integrate information from English, Spanish, and Chinese sources to provide a comprehensive answer about the international project.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 国际项目Alpha的目标是将用户参与度提高30%，预算为200万美元，将在三个国家实施。

chunks.title: Project Alpha Goal (English)
chunks.content: Project Alpha aims to increase user engagement by 30%.

chunks.title: Project Alpha Budget (Spanish)
chunks.content: El presupuesto del proyecto Alpha es de 2 millones de dólares.

chunks.title: Project Alpha Scope (Chinese)
chunks.content: 该项目将在三个国家实施。

test_cases_collection.name: Temporal - Timeline Organization
test_cases_collection.description: Test ability to organize events chronologically and understand temporal relationships
test_cases_collection.query: 整理一下产品发布的完整时间线
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a temporal reasoning expert. Organize events in chronological order and provide timeline analysis.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Extract all temporal information and organize it into a clear chronological sequence.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 产品发布时间线：2023年1月完成产品设计→3月通过原型测试→6月开始小批量生产→9月正式上市销售。整个过程历时8个月。

chunks.title: Product Design Completion
chunks.content: 2023年1月完成产品设计

chunks.title: Prototype Testing Success
chunks.content: 2023年3月通过原型测试

chunks.title: Small Batch Production Start
chunks.content: 2023年6月开始小批量生产

chunks.title: Official Product Launch
chunks.content: 2023年9月正式上市销售

test_cases_collection.name: Domain Specific - Healthcare AI Applications
test_cases_collection.description: Test domain-specific knowledge in healthcare AI and medical diagnostics
test_cases_collection.query: 人工智能在医疗诊断中有哪些主要应用？
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a healthcare AI expert specializing in medical diagnostics and AI applications in healthcare.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Provide comprehensive information about AI applications in medical diagnostics, focusing on specific technologies and benefits.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: AI在医疗诊断中的主要应用包括：医学影像分析（CT、MRI、X射线的肿瘤和疾病检测）、预测分析（早期疾病检测）、个性化治疗方案制定、自动化药物发现、虚拟护士助理和行政工作流程优化。这些技术提高了诊断准确性，降低了医疗成本，实现了个性化医疗方法。

chunks.title: AI in Medical Imaging and Diagnostics
chunks.content:
# AI in Medical Imaging

Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing medical imaging through advanced computer vision and deep learning techniques.

## Key Applications

### Radiology Enhancement
- **CT Scans**: AI algorithms detect lung nodules, brain bleeds, and fractures with 95%+ accuracy
- **MRI Analysis**: Automated segmentation of brain tumors and multiple sclerosis lesions
- **X-ray Interpretation**: Pneumonia detection, bone fracture identification, and cardiac abnormality detection
- **Mammography**: Early breast cancer detection with reduced false positives

### Diagnostic Accuracy
- Studies show AI systems can match or exceed human radiologist performance
- Reduction in diagnostic errors by up to 30% in some applications
- Faster interpretation times, enabling quicker treatment decisions
- Consistent performance not affected by fatigue factors

chunks.title: Predictive Analytics in Patient Care
chunks.content:
# Predictive Healthcare Analytics

Machine learning algorithms are enabling proactive healthcare interventions through predictive modeling.

## Early Disease Detection

### Cardiovascular Risk Assessment
- AI models analyze EHR data to predict heart attack risk
- Integration with wearable device data for real-time monitoring
- Genetic factor consideration in risk stratification
- Lifestyle pattern analysis for prevention strategies

### Sepsis Prediction
- Early warning systems detect sepsis 6-12 hours before clinical symptoms
- Vital signs monitoring with pattern recognition
- Laboratory result trend analysis
- Automated alert systems for clinical staff

test_cases_collection.name: Quantum Computing - Technical Concepts and Applications
test_cases_collection.description: Test understanding of quantum computing concepts and real-world applications
test_cases_collection.query: 量子计算的核心原理是什么，它有哪些实际应用？
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a quantum computing expert with deep knowledge of quantum mechanics and computational theory.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Explain quantum computing principles in accessible terms and highlight current and potential real-world applications.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 量子计算的核心原理包括量子叠加（qubit同时处于多个状态）、量子纠缠（qubit间的关联）和量子干涉（操控概率波）。实际应用包括：密码学（Shor算法破解RSA加密）、优化问题（物流、金融建模）、药物发现（分子模拟）、机器学习加速、材料科学和人工智能。目前技术仍面临量子相干性和错误校正等挑战。

chunks.title: Quantum Computing Fundamentals
chunks.content:
# Quantum Computing Principles

## Core Concepts

### Quantum Superposition
- Qubits can exist in multiple states simultaneously
- Unlike classical bits that are either 0 or 1
- Enables parallel processing of information
- Measured using probability amplitudes

### Quantum Entanglement
- Correlation between qubits regardless of distance
- 'Spooky action at a distance' (Einstein)
- Enables quantum teleportation and superdense coding
- Fundamental for quantum computing power

### Quantum Interference
- Manipulation of probability waves
- Constructive and destructive interference patterns
- Key for quantum algorithm design
- Enables amplification of correct answers

chunks.title: Quantum Computing Applications
chunks.content:
# Real-World Quantum Applications

## Current Applications

### Cryptography
- Shor's algorithm for factoring large numbers
- Breaking RSA encryption systems
- Quantum key distribution (QKD)
- Post-quantum cryptography development

### Optimization Problems
- Logistics and supply chain optimization
- Financial portfolio management
- Traffic flow optimization
- Machine learning model training

### Scientific Computing
- Molecular simulation for drug discovery
- Materials science research
- Climate modeling
- High-energy physics simulations

test_cases_collection.name: Complex Reasoning - Causal Analysis
test_cases_collection.description: Test ability to identify and explain causal relationships between events
test_cases_collection.query: 为什么公司利润下降了？
test_cases_collection.system_prompt: You are a business analyst expert in causal reasoning and root cause analysis.
test_cases_collection.user_instruction: Analyze the provided information to identify causal relationships and explain the reasons behind the profit decline.
test_cases_collection.expected_answer: 公司利润下降8%的主要原因有两个：一是供应链中断导致生产成本增加15%，二是竞争对手推出更具价格优势的产品。

chunks.title: Supply Chain Disruption Impact
chunks.content: 由于供应链中断，生产成本增加了15%。

chunks.title: Competitive Market Pressure
chunks.content: 主要竞争对手推出了更具价格优势的产品。

chunks.title: Financial Performance Results
chunks.content: 公司利润同比下降了8%。

collection_metadata.usage_guidelines: This enhanced test suite covers multiple dimensions of RAG system evaluation including core functionality, robustness, reasoning capabilities, multilingual processing, temporal understanding, and domain-specific knowledge. Each test case includes realistic content, proper metadata, and expected answers for validation.
